name: CL_RMT_SVC_DAT_INF
description: This table contains service date information for a service line in a remittance record.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query.

columns.name: SVC_DATE_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the Code specifying type of service date.

columns.name: SERVICE_LN
columns.description: This is the service line for which service date is specified
